title: Restricted nonfreeness
content: In this subsection, we define restricted nonfreeness (or relative nonfreeness).

blocks.name: wrnf
blocks.origin: prop wff wrnf(setvar s0, class c0, wff w0) { F/(s0 ∈ c0, w0) }

df-bj-rnf
blocks.content: Definition of restricted nonfreeness. Informally, the proposition ` F/ x e. A ph ` means that ` ph ( x ) ` does not vary on ` A ` . (Contributed by BJ, 19-Mar-2021.)
